CWPlFVxNZmc.title: Home Assistant Basics - all you need to get started with a new smart home
CWPlFVxNZmc.author: Adam Cooke
CWPlFVxNZmc.description:
This video covers all the basics needed for getting started with Home Assistant. It's a bit of a beast! It covers:

* how to get Home Assistant up and running on a Raspberry Pi
* setting up new devices
* making some automations
* using the Home Assistant Cloud
* setting up Alexa & Google Assistant
* how the mobile apps work
* creating dashboards

Links
=====

Home Assistant: https://www.home-assistant.io/

Raspberry Pi from The Pi Hut: https://thepihut.com/collections/raspberry-pi-kits-and-bundles/products/raspberry-pi-starter-kit?variant=20336446079038

Raspberry Pi Imager: https://www.raspberrypi.com/software/

HACS - the custom component store: https://hacs.xyz/

Follow my blog at https://adam.ac
